title: Create New Loan
custom_preconds:
GIVEN user is logged in as a Club (test-SD-admin@mlb.com / western@WEDGE)
AND has a player with a Minor League status=Active
AND has an Addendum C
custom_steps:
WHEN user opens player
AND clicks Create New on Player's History
AND selects Transaction > Minor > Assignment > Loan
custom_expected: THEN blank Loan will open in Edit mode

title: Submit Loan
custom_preconds: GIVEN user has completed Create New Loan
custom_steps: WHEN user fills in required fieldsAND clicks Submit
custom_expected: THEN Loan is submitted succesfullyAND should see a Blue Succesful Submit message

title: Approve Loan
custom_preconds:
GIVEN user is logged in as BOC (test-BOC-approver@mlb.com/pass@HEARD)
AND has completed Submit Loan
AND the Loan will place a player on a team within the Mexican league
custom_steps: WHEN user clicks Approve
custom_expected:
THEN Loan is approved succesfully
AND should see a Blue Succesful Approve message

title: Reverse Loan
custom_preconds:
GIVEN user is logged in as BOC (test_BOC_approver@mlb.com/pass@HEARD)
AND has completed Approve Loan
custom_steps: WHEN user clicks Reverse
custom_expected:
THEN Loan is approved succesfully
AND should see a Blue Succesful Reverse message

title: Approve Place on NES List
custom_preconds:

custom_steps: WHEN user clicks Approve

THEN Place on NES List is approved succesfully

title: Reverse Place on NES List
custom_preconds:
GIVEN user is logged in as BOC (test_BOC_approver@mlb.com/pass@HEARD)
AND has completed Approve Place on NES List
custom_steps: WHEN user clicks Reverse
custom_expected:
THEN Place on NES List is approved succesfully
AND should see a Blue Succesful Reverse message

title: Create New Return
custom_preconds:
GIVEN user is logged in as a Club (test-SD-admin@mlb.com/western@WEDGE)
AND has a player on loan with the Mexican League
custom_steps:
WHEN user navigates to the clipboard
AND views the notification widget
AND clicks on the Player name next to the notification stating that the Loan of Player was approved
AND clicks Create New on Player's History
AND selects Transaction > Minor > Assignment > Return
custom_expected: THEN blank Return will open in Edit mode

title: Submit Return
custom_preconds: GIVEN user has completed Create New Return
custom_steps: WHEN user fills in required fieldsAND clicks Submit
custom_expected: THEN Return is submitted succesfullyAND should see a Blue Succesful Submit message

title: Approve Return
custom_preconds: GIVEN user is logged in as BOC (admin-boc-all/beginathens975)AND has completed Submit Return
custom_steps: WHEN user clicks Approve
custom_expected: THEN Return is approved succesfullyAND should see a Blue Succesful Approve message

title: Reverse Return
custom_preconds: GIVEN user is logged in as BOC (admin-boc-all/beginathens975)AND has completed Approve Return
custom_steps: WHEN user clicks Reverse
custom_expected: THEN Return is approved succesfullyAND should see a Blue Succesful Reverse message

title: Create and Accept Rule 6 Return Process
custom_preconds:
GIVEN that user has logged in as (test-boc-approver@mlb.com/pass@HEARD)
AND has a Rule 5 Selected player  (e.g. Alan Cordoba)
custom_steps:
WHEN user opens player
AND clicks Create New on Player's History
AND selects Transaction > Major > Assignment > Rule 6 Return Process
AND accepts the transaction
custom_expected: THEN a Rule 6 Return Process - Accepted transaction is created

title: Check that Rule 5 Selection tx is created and Reject it
custom_preconds:
***Navigate to player profile that was used in [C1075302], a Rule 5 Selection should be created with "Accepted" appended to it, open it, and reject (this will clean up the tx from being created)

GIVEN user has completed Create New Rule 6 Return Process
custom_steps:
WHEN user fills in required fields
AND clicks Submit
custom_expected:
THEN Rule 6 Return Process is submitted succesfully
AND should see a Blue Succesful Submit message

title: Create and Reject Rule 6 Return Process
custom_preconds:
***BOC logs in, finds a Rule 5 selected player, created Rule 6 Return process for him, submit it to club and then Reject it

GIVEN user is logged in as BOC (admin-boc-all/beginathens975)
AND has completed Submit Rule 6 Return Process
custom_steps: WHEN user clicks Approve
custom_expected:
THEN Rule 6 Return Process is approved succesfully
AND should see a Blue Succesful Approve message

title: Check that Rule 5 Selection tx is created and Reject it
custom_preconds:
******Navigate to player profile that was used in [C1075304], a Rule 5 Selection should be created with "Rejected" appended to it, open it, and reject (this will clean up the tx from being created)

GIVEN user is logged in as BOC (admin-boc-all/beginathens975)
AND has completed Approve Rule 6 Return Process
custom_steps: WHEN user clicks Reverse
custom_expected:
THEN Rule 6 Return Process is approved succesfully
AND should see a Blue Succesful Reverse message

title: Create New Accepted Qualifying Offer Under Article XX(B)(3)
custom_preconds:
GIVEN user is logged in as BOC (test-BOC-admin@mlb.com/pass@HEARD)
AND has a player that is a Major League Free Agent
AND has an XX(B) - Free Agency transaction in the past 10 days
custom_steps:
WHEN user opens player
AND clicks Create New on Player's History
AND selects Transaction > Major > Assignment > Accepted Qualifying Offer Under Article XX(B)(3)
custom_expected: THEN blank Accepted Qualifying Offer Under Article XX(B)(3) will open in Edit mode

title: Submit Accepted Qualifying Offer Under Article XX(B)(3)
custom_preconds: GIVEN user has completed Create New Accepted Qualifying Offer Under Article XX(B)(3)
custom_steps: WHEN user fills in required fieldsAND clicks Submit
custom_expected: THEN Accepted Qualifying Offer Under Article XX(B)(3) is submitted succesfullyAND should see a Blue Succesful Submit message

custom_preconds: GIVEN user is logged in as BOC (admin-boc-all/beginathens975)AND has completed Submit Accepted Qualifying Offer Under Article XX(B)(3)
custom_steps: WHEN user clicks Approve
custom_expected: THEN Accepted Qualifying Offer Under Article XX(B)(3) is approved succesfullyAND should see a Blue Succesful Approve message

title: Reverse Accepted Qualifying Offer Under Article XX(B)(3)

custom_steps: WHEN user clicks Reverse
custom_expected: THEN Accepted Qualifying Offer Under Article XX(B)(3) is approved succesfullyAND should see a Blue Succesful Reverse message

GIVEN user is logged in as a BOC (test-BOC-approver@mlb.com/pass@HEARD)
